articles.description: Luis Suarez has urged Darwin Nunez to learn from his mistakes after the Liverpool star was sent off for headbutting Joachim Andersen during the Reds' 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace on Monday.
articles.content: Luis Suarez has urged fellow Uruguayan Darwin Nunez to learn from his mistakes after the Liverpool star was sent off for headbutting Joachim Andersen during the Reds' 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace on … [+2866 chars]
